attributes.action: immediately start a program of road improvements to the A303 and A30 to ensure that at least a Dual Carrageway exists the entire length from M25 / M3 to Redruth in Cornwall by 2012.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are several short sections on the above route that are still single carridgeways. This is the number one route to Devon and Cornwall from the South East. The cost of completing this would be negliable compared to the many thousands of man hours wasted im traffic holdups. The longest section is less than 10 miles. The  route should follow the existing route if posible with minimal diversions, so by limiting the enviroumental effect.
